scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Wythe County School Records consists of six registers used by teachers in various schools in the Wytheville School District from 1886 to 1903. Each volume, issued by the Superintendent of Public Instruction for Virginia, was used by teachers to record student names, attendance, subjects taught, and property and equipment in each school. Each volume contains two sections, the daily record and the term record. The daily record is a monthly listing of students, their age, and their attendance record. Some volumes list the grades received by students in various subjects. The term record is an annual compilation of statisticsl. This section also lists condition of the school building, property, and equipment.

did.unittitle: Volume 1. Public Schoo No. 1, Wytheville District, Petunia School - Teachers's Register. 1894-1901.

scopecontent.p: Teachers included: M. Etta Kegley (1894-1895); J. B. Sharitz (1895-1897); Etta V. Williams (1897-1898); G. W. J. Sharitz (1898-1899); Claudia Hagy (1899-1900); and S. K. Cassell (1900-1901).

did.unittitle: Volume 2. Public School No. 3, Wytheville District, Cedar Hill School - Teacher's Register. 1886-1893.

scopecontent.p: Teachers included: Ella B. Patterson (1886-1887); Dick Sharitz ( 1888-1890); Ella B. Patterson (1890-1891); M. Etta Kegley (1892-1893).

did.unittitle: Volume 3. Public School No. 6, Wytheville District, Fairview School - Teacher's Register. 1900-1903.

scopecontent.p: Teachers included: K. C. Poston and Mrs. T. J. B. Sharitz (1900-1901); Carrie Neel and Bettie Poston (1901-1902); Frank W. Reid and Bettie Poston (1902-1903).

did.unittitle: Volume 4. Public School No. 8, Wytheville District, Bald Hill School - Teacher's Register. 1893-1899.

scopecontent.p: Teachers included: Ella Brown Patterson (1893-1895); Minnie A. Kegley (1895-1896); Kyle C. Poston (1896-1898); F. J. B. Sharitz (1898-1899).

did.unittitle: Volume 5. Public School No. 9, Wytheville District - Teacher's Register. 1890-1894.

scopecontent.p: Teachers included: Emma R. Calfee and Etta Kegley (1890-1891); C. N. Rudolph and N. D. Rudolph (1891-1892); G. B. Morehead (1892-1893); C. K. Rudolph and wife (1893-1894).

did.unittitle: Volume 6. Public School No. 9, Wytheville District - Teacher's Register. 1899-1903.

scopecontent.p: Teachers included: G. B. Morehead and wife (1899-1900); A. C. Patterson (1900-1901); T. N. Umberger (1901-1902); Nora Latimer Hickok (1902-1903).
